chunks.content: Immediately behind the basilica is the Grotto, a Marian place of prayer and reflection. It is a replica of the grotto at Lourdes, France where the Virgin Mary reputedly appeared to Saint Bernadette Soubirous in 1858.

metadata.relevance_reason: This part directly describes what the Grotto is and its significance.
metadata.answer_contribution: Provides a clear definition and context of the Grotto at Notre Dame.

required_info: significance of the Grotto at Notre Dame
